description: a(n) = n-th sept-factorial number divided by 5.
links: Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=n*s;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 11, 5!, 7}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 08 2008 *)Rest[FoldList[Times,1,7*Range[20]-2]/5] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 30 2013 *)
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
